TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kngungu, title = Kngungu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kngungu} }

S.FORM: Kngungu Itiniay i Nan'ao Cen no Yilan ko Kngungu a niyaro', 97 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 351 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 332 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 19 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 88%, Amis 3%, Truku 1%, Bunun 1%, Saysiyat 1%, roma 1%.

Kngongo Itiniay i Nan'ao Cen no Yilan ko Kngongo a niyaro', 97 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 351 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 332 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 19 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 88%, Amis 3%, Troko 1%, Bonon 1%, Saysiyat 1%, roma 1%.
